Constructor Detail

Records

protected Records()
Constructor used by subclasses to create an instance of the Records class in order to extend the functionality of this class. Since the class is an utility class, the protected modifier on the default constructor prevents instances of this class from being created.
Method Detail

synchronizedRecord

public static RecordIF synchronizedRecord(RecordIF record)

synchronizedRecordTable

public static RecordTableIF synchronizedRecordTable(RecordTableIF recordTable)
synchronizedRecordTable

unmodifiableRecord

public static RecordIF unmodifiableRecord(RecordIF record)
unmodifiableRecord wraps a RecordIF object inside another RecordIF object that cannot be modified. The isReadOnly method always returns true and calling the setReadOnly method throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
Parameters:
record - is a Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordIF object to convert to an absolute read-only record.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordIF object encapsulating the original RecordIF object with read-only capabilities.

unmodifiableRecordTable

public static RecordTableIF unmodifiableRecordTable(RecordTableIF recordTable)
unmodifiableRecordTable wraps a RecordTableIF object inside another RecordTableIF object that cannot be modified. The isReadOnly method always returns true and calling the setReadOnly method results in throwing an UnsupportedOperationException.
Parameters:
record - is a Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordTableIF object to convert to an absolute read-only record table.
Returns:
a Ljjb.toolbox.util.RecordTableIF object encapsulating the original RecordTableIF object with read-only capabilities.
